name: Growth For Both!
description:
*Please note before purchasing! * These stories are from the Writing.com interactive of the same name (https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1213992-Hesper) As such, while these stories are large and lengthy, they are still growing and so the stories inside are not fully completed.

---

Welcome to Hesper! Many stories take place in the small town of Hesper where a lazy guy & his friends start to put on a LOT of weight... This is but one GIANT collection of some of those adventures. “Growth for Both”; focuses on Conrad and his close friend Amber Sullivan as they both join the fast-food workforce. Working around so much food the pounds are guaranteed to pile on the two of them, but YOU get to decide how it happens, and what else happens along the way.  Will the two together reach over a ton in size? Maybe just one is the gainer in the relationship, and ends up bigger than a damn house? The choices are yours to explore in this collection which is over 133,000 words long and features 10  exclusive illustrations by Saxxon.

With ever purchase you'll receive;

  1. A copy of the game
  2.  PDF versions of the collection for those who prefer to read/play that way.
  3. "Lightweight" HTML file versions of the story.
  4. A folder containing the original Saxxon sketches and the colorized versions in their full-size glory.
